meanings.definition: Outside the walls or boundaries, as of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed playing extramural games in the open field.
meanings.sent2: The extramural picnic was held in the park outside the school.
meanings.sent3: The extramural playground was so vast that it felt like a mini adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her extramural imagination knew no limits, exploring beyond the known boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The extramural landscape was breathtaking, with endless fields stretching out.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to education or activities conducted outside of a university or institution.
meanings.sent1: The extramural classes offered new learning opportunities beyond the campus.
meanings.sent2: She participated in extramural sports to stay active outside of school.
meanings.sent3: The extramural science fair was a fun twist on traditional learning.
meanings.sent4: His extramural interests led him to discover hidden talents outside the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The extramural workshops provided valuable skills outside the usual curriculum.
